hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: A surah has just been revealed to me. He then recited:”In the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful. Lo! We have given thee Abundance” until he finished it. Then he asked: Do you know what Abundance (al-Kawthar) is? They replied: Allah and His Apostle know it better. He said: It is a river of which my Lord, the Exalted, the Majestic has promised me to give in Paradise

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَرَ الْجَهْرَ بِـ { بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ }
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Do Not Say That "Bismilaahir-Rahmanir-Rahim" Should Be Said Aloud
